meta.description: Determine the optimal number of premium and regular desktops to produce to maximize profit under budget and sales constraints.

sets.name: DESKTOP_TYPES
sets.description: Types of desktops produced by the store.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost to make each type of desktop.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit from selling each type of desktop.

params.name: max_sales
params.description: Maximum number of desktops that can be sold each month.

params.name: max_budget
params.description: Maximum budget for making desktops each month.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of desktop to produce.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling desktops.

constraints.name: sales_limit
constraints.description: Total number of desktops sold must not exceed 200.

constraints.name: budget_limit
constraints.description: Total cost of making desktops must not exceed $300,000.
